analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#560-574) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#569-572)

BlockportCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#754-771) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(teamVault,twentyPercentAllocation) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#757-758)
	-token.mint(companyVault,twentyPercentAllocation) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#758-759)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#759-760)

BlockportCrowdsale.validPurchase.whitelisted (local variable @ /unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#743-744) shadows:
	- CrowdsaleWhitelist.whitelisted (modifier @ /unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#446-449)

BlockportCrowdsale.setRate (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#774-786) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#777-779)

BlockportCrowdsale.setCrowdsaleDates (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol)

BlockportCrowdsale.maxInvestmentInWei should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#694-695)
BlockportCrowdsale.minimalInvestmentInWei should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0xb5572c64f2dd352e68d7c708473838f1ac218d90.sol#693-694)
